passives.name: Doing Something
passives.effects: You are permanently [[File:On Fire! buff.png|20px|link=]] '''On Fire!''', causing you to {{as|Burn}} enemies within 400 units every second for {{as|{{pp|26 to 43}} magic damage}} and reduce your abilities' cooldowns by {{fd|0.2}} seconds every {{fd|0.25}} seconds as well as gain {{as|5% '''bonus''' movement speed}}, increased to {{as|20%|ms}} while facing nearby enemy champions, {{as|20% '''bonus''' attack speed}}, {{as|{{pp|50 to 900}} '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|{{fd|1.5}} '''bonus''' mana regeneration}}, and {{as|4 '''bonus''' energy regeneration}}. While '''On Fire!''', however, you also take {{rd|25%|35%}} increased damage and reduce the effectiveness of incoming heals and shields by 25%.

effects_structured.raw: You are permanently [[File:On Fire! buff.png 20px link=]] '''On Fire!''', causing you to {{as Burn}} enemies within 400 units every second for {{as {{pp 26 to 43}} magic damage}} and reduce your abilities' cooldowns by {{fd 0.2}} seconds every {{fd 0.25}} seconds as well as gain {{as 5% '''bonus''' movement speed}}, increased to {{as 20% ms}} while facing nearby enemy champions, {{as 20% '''bonus''' attack speed}}, {{as {{pp 50 to 900}} '''bonus''' health}}, {{as {{fd 1.5}} '''bonus''' mana regeneration}}, and {{as 4 '''bonus''' energy regeneration}}
While '''On Fire!''', however, you also take {{rd 25% 35%}} increased damage and reduce the effectiveness of incoming heals and shields by 25%.
